content: Open QA. Language & linguistics. Be brief
Give a brief (1-2 sentences) definition of Discourse analysis.

chosen: Discourse analysis is the study of language as it is used in social and cultural contexts, taking into account factors such as power relationships, identity construction, and ideology.
rejected: Discourse analysis is the study of language as it is used in social and cultural contexts, taking into account factors such as power relationships, identity, and ideology. It involves examining how language is used to construct meaning and how it reflects and shapes our understanding of the world.
snapchosen: Discourse analysis is the study of language as it is used in social and cultural contexts, taking into account factors such as power relationships, identity construction, and ideology.
snaprejected: Discourse analysis is the study of language as it is used in social and cultural contexts, taking into account factors such as power relationships, identity, and ideology. It involves examining how language is used to construct meaning and how it reflects and shapes our understanding of the world.
